name: Fictionpress - reenable text selection.
description: I tried ssokolow's version on Fictionpress.com hoping it would work but it didn't; I took hiss css and just tweeked the website taking out fanfiction and replacing it with fictionpress; I'm not expert and it wouldn't surprise me if this doesn't work.
additional_info: All credit goes to ssokolow, if this actually works; this was taken from his fanfiction.net style.
